document.full_text: nato countries agreed on thursday to enforce a no-fly zone in libya to protect civilians against muammar gaddafi's forces, but fell short of taking full command of all military operations in the north african state.
document.title: nato to run libya no-fly zone but not all action
lines_and_colors: nato countries agreed on thursday to enforce a no-fly zone in libya to protect civilians against muammar gaddafi's forces, but fell short of taking full command of all military operations in the north african state.
